abstract: Boston Dynamics, a robotics company, showed off its latest battlefield robot, called AlphaDog. It's scary.
snippet: Boston Dynamics, a robotics company, showed off its latest battlefield robot, called AlphaDog. It's scary.
lead_paragraph: In 2007 Boston Dynamics, a robotics company, posted a video online of a robot called the BigDog that could run on any type of terrain like a dog. The video quickly went viral, partly because people were in awe of the robot's agility and also because it was so scary to watch.

headline.main: Unleash the Robot Dogs of War
